UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: "Specificity Determinants" Improve Therapeutic Indices of Two Antimicrobial Peptides Piscidin 1 and Dermaseptin S4 Against the Gram-negative Pathogens Acinetobacter baumannii and Pseudomonas aeruginosa.
Literature.Author: Jiang Z, Vasil AI, Vasil ML, Hodges RS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=2.8µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=2.8µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 649(MIC=1.4µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 1012(MIC=2.8µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 985(MIC=0.7µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=11.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAK(MIC=11.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=22.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CP204(MIC=11.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M2(MIC=11.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa WR5(MIC=11.3µM)
